    Custom ggplot2 Theme for BoeckLab

    theme_BoeckLab.Rd

    A custom ggplot2 theme inspired by the publication style of the BoeckLab. This theme provides a clean and professional look for plots, with options to customize font size, font family, axis text angle, borders, legend position, facet spacing, and plot margins.

    Usage

    theme_BoeckLab(
  base_size = 14,
  base_family = "Arial",
  x.text.angle = 0,
  border = FALSE,
  margin = TRUE,
  legend = "top",
  spacing = 0.5
)

    Arguments

    base_size

    Numeric. The base font size for text elements. Default is 14.

    base_family

    Character. The base font family for text elements. Default is "Arial".

    x.text.angle

    Numeric. The angle of the X-axis text labels. Default is 0 (horizontal).

    border

    Logical. Whether to add a border around the plot. Default is FALSE.

    margin

    Logical. Whether to add space between multi-faceted plots. Default is TRUE.

    legend

    Character. The position of the legend. One of "top", "bottom", "left", "right", or "none". Default is "top".

    spacing

    Numeric. The spacing between facets in a multi-faceted plot. Default is 0.5.

    Value

    A ggplot2 theme object.

    Examples

    library(ggplot2)
p <- ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = wt, y = mpg)) + geom_point()
p + theme_BoeckLab()
